name: SSWeb Bill Markup Consistency
description:
CSS edits designed to effect maximum visual consistency across bills from all 50 states and the US. Intended mainly for SSWeb bills but with some support for specific state websites.

Also affects widths so that long texts are not so difficult to follow on widened browser windows.
additional_info: - It is currently not possible to affect any meaningful changes to Iowa and Pennsylvania bills, even though they are texts and not PDFs. Their problems are the same: the markup is not on the text, it is overlaid as an image on a rigidly laid out text to ensure the image and text match where they are supposed to. This format is extremely unfriendly to secondary, on-the-fly reformatting
